post.author: Final_Light
post.body:
Just recently downloaded 3DMark06 (free) edition and i must say its quite beautifull some of the benchmarks they put in it.
Its the first time ive used 06 and im very impressed by the spectacular design, creativity and hardwork the futuremark guys put into this. Anyway onto the subject, i want to to host a thread to find out ... "Whats Your 3DMark06 Score ?" to see what kind of mark people get on there machines. Im not sure how many people have 3DMark06 as it is a 580MB download from the site.

http://www.futuremark.com/download/3dmark06/

So for people who allready have it or people with fast internet connection ... i ask you ... What is youre 3DMark06 Score ?

System:
C2D E6600 @ 2.4Ghz
8800GTS 640MB
2GB DDR2 RAM
640GB SATAII

Settings:
1280 x 1024
No AA
Filtering Optimal

Score:
8757

post.author: bkt
post.body:
mac wrote:
youre e-penis is soo huge, my friend.. but its a boring and pointless thread.. and actualy.. yours is kinda small.. look here

http://www.futuremark.com/community/halloffame/


The only pointless thing I see here is your reply.

I agree with zombie. This thread isn't pointless until e-penises start clashing. Until then, there's no reason why a guy can't be curious about how his new pc compares to others. In fact I'd like to compare notes as I have an almost identical system to him with the exception of the video card. My 8800gts is the 320mb version, so it would be interesting to see how our scores differ.

post.author: Duff
post.body:
i remember doing one of the old ones with a friend of mine, hes comp had double the score; which we expected.
it was still cool.

i think my comp if i did a current one would have a negative score its so old school.

post.author: mac
post.body:
well if you would be really interested you could visit the website and browse through dozend configurations etc...

at the end its not my descision what quality this board will end up.. i remeber times on here where actualy quality discussion took place.. not a teeny place to ramble over the same stuff over and over again.. but well.. since bna is fine with it.. why should i care.. gone one with youre score comparsion..

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
mac wrote:
at the end its not my descision what quality this board will end up.. i remeber times on here where actualy quality discussion took place.. not a teeny place to ramble over the same stuff over and over again.. but well.. since bna is fine with it.. why should i care.. gone one with youre score comparsion..


Actually this is the general discussion forum section which serves the purpose to catch all topics which otherwise would add too much noise to the content focused categories.

I personally don't care about 3D Mark scores. Everytime I build a new computer I run the usual tests to see wether everything runs within the typical range of a specific system configuration, but that's about it.

Albeit it's "my" board it's at the same time meant to offer a discussion framework for the registered users, called community. If every 12 or 18 months a topic like this one pops up, then fine, why not. It's not like these topics make up for most of the content here.

So I think we can agree the quality of D3W and all subsequent sites which will form around this board is not in danger because of one 3D mark post

But one thing is for sure - I wholeheartly appreciate your and anyone else concern to keep the quality up!
